futureQuestion: Can't wait? You are peeking at the question for {date}:

0.1: What is your main goal for the year?
0.2: What are you most grateful for?
0.4: What is your best memory from last year?
0.5: What was the biggest goal you recently achieved?
0.6: What material possession could you not live without?
0.8: What is the last good thing you ate?
0.9: What is your current favorite snack?
0.13: What did you have for dinner?
0.15: Who did you receive the last phone call from?
0.16: Who are you in love with?
0.17: What's the silliest thing you've done recently?
0.20: What is the most difficult thing you are fighting against?
0.21: Today I wish I had more ______________.
0.24: What are you looking for in life?
0.27: How much did you spend at the supermarket last time?
0.29: What was your last major purchase?
0.30: My house (home) is a HOME (in an emotional sense) because ______________.
0.31: Who is the last person to tell you they love or care about you?

1.1: What is your favorite piece of furniture you own?
1.2: The most expensive bill I paid last month was ______________.
1.3: What is the last thing you apologized for?
1.5: On a scale of 1 to 10, how would you rate your health?
1.6: If you could relive today, would you change anything?
1.7: Name a person you were hoping to avoid today.
1.8: What is the largest screen TV in your house?
1.9: What time did you go to sleep last night?
1.12: How many photos did you take/post today?
1.13: Which book are you reading today?
1.14: How many hours did you sleep last night?
1.15: What's one small thing that always makes you happy?
1.17: What was the last new thing you experienced?
1.22: List 3 things you need to buy.
1.23: Today it made me feel good to know ______________.
1.24: In whose life did you make a difference today?
1.27: What would have made this day perfect?
1.29: What did you do to take advantage of this extra day this year?

2.1: What is the funniest thing you heard today?
2.2: If you could have another talent, what would it be?
2.4: What do you wish you hadn't said?
2.5: What was the first thing you drank and/or ate today?
2.7: On a scale of 1 to 10, how clean is your house?
2.8: What is the last song you listened to?
2.10: What is the most valuable thing you own?
2.12: What was the most unexpected thing that happened today?
2.13: How much time did you dedicate to yourself today?
2.15: What did you learn new today, even something small?
2.20: What are you happy you did today?
2.21: When was the last time you were on vacation? Where did you go?
2.25: If you could read someone's mind today, who would you choose?
2.26: What was the easiest thing today?
2.29: What did you find in the mailbox today?

3.1: Did you make anyone laugh today? Did you do it intentionally?
3.3: Was today an ordinary day? Why? Why not?
3.4: Who do you trust the most?
3.5: When is your next important deadline? What is it about?
3.6: What did you eat for breakfast today?
3.7: Do you have any regrets today?
3.8: How did you add a touch of art to your day today?
3.10: When was the last time you danced?
3.11: List the people you live with.
3.12: What were you afraid of today?
3.14: What is your favorite TV show?
3.16: Who is the last person you kissed?
3.19: What is the oldest thing you are wearing today?
3.20: List 5 things you should have done today.
3.21: Where did you spend most of your time today?
3.23: What did you worry about today?
3.25: What is the next big purchase you need to make?
3.26: What is the last thing that made you cry?
3.29: Where do you want to go next?

4.1: Who was kind to you today?
4.2: Who is the last person you talked to?
4.4: The store I frequent the most is ______________.
4.6: Describe your favorite pair of shoes you own.
4.7: What rule affects you the most during the day?
4.8: How many pairs of shoes do you own?
4.10: I wish ______________ had not been invented.
4.11: What is the most expensive thing you own that you can carry with you?
4.12: How much money do you have in your wallet right now?
4.13: What made today a unique day?
4.14: What did you not complete today?
4.16: What did you receive by email today?
4.17: What did you want to say today?
4.18: What was the biggest decision you made today?
4.20: What is the biggest truth about your day?
4.21: What is the last thing you settled for?
4.22: Describe your day in a 6-word sentence.
4.23: What was the last thing that hurt you?
4.24: Did you use your time wisely today?
4.25: Did you have a dream last night? Describe it.
4.26: Where would you like to be?
4.27: What songs did you listen to today?
4.28: What was the funniest thing you did today?
4.29: What do you love most about the things you have to do every day?
4.31: What was the most “down” moment today?

5.1: What is one small thing you can do to take care of yourself?
5.2: How close to perfect was today?
5.3: When was the last time you sang at the top of your lungs?
5.4: What was the last meeting/gathering you attended?
5.5: Is there something that made you sad today?
5.7: List 5 things you wish you had invented.
5.8: What was the last recipe you cooked?
5.9: Who is your most trusted friend?
5.10: What made you lose track of time today?
5.12: If you could give one piece of advice to your 10-year-old self, what would it be?
5.15: What scares you but you would still like to do?
5.16: How do you picture yourself in five years?
5.17: What is your favorite dish to cook?
5.19: What is the most important thing that was said to you today?
5.20: What is the last thing you thought about today?
5.21: What is the title of the last book you read?
5.23: What project are you working on?
5.24: What motivates you to keep going even when things get tough?
5.25: What is the most precious material possession you own?
5.26: Were you feeling good or bad today?
5.27: What is the smartest thing you did today?
5.28: What are you most confident about?
5.30: The last thing I bought for myself was ______________.

6.2: Who was the last person you saw today?
6.3: What do you need to let go of?
6.4: What movie would you like to watch?
6.5: I can't/I am not able to ______________.
6.6: Who did you send a message to today?
6.7: What is a question you are searching for an answer to in your life?
6.9: Name one thing you should throw away, but you don't.
6.10: What has made you satisfied with yourself recently?
6.11: Who did you see most often today?
6.13: Did you talk to a friend today?
6.14: If you could travel anywhere in the world, where would you go?
6.15: What are you most afraid of?
6.16: Did you ask anyone for help today?
6.17: What did you manage to accomplish today?
6.18: Did you behave like a mature person today?
6.21: What is the first thing you do in the morning?
6.22: What would you not want to exist, or have less of, in the world?
6.24: What were your goals for the day?
6.25: What was the last thing that made you laugh out loud?
6.26: Who did you have dinner with?
6.27: How did you make a difference today?
6.28: What is the thing you carry everywhere with you?
6.29: Is there someone you miss right now?

7.1: What did you eat for lunch today?
7.3: What do you want to finish tomorrow?
7.4: What is the last gift you gave?
7.5: The last time I worked out ______________.
7.7: What memory crossed your mind today?
7.8: What is the last risk you took?
7.10: Did you think about anyone in particular today? Who and why?
7.11: On a scale of 1 to 10, my day was ______________.
7.12: What does the last message you received say?
7.13: Do you owe money to anyone?
7.14: What is your favorite part of your body?
7.15: What is the worst thing you ate today?
7.16: I hope no one was watching while ______________.
7.17: How many kilometers did you travel today?
7.18: Who was the first person you saw today?
7.19: What is the strongest feeling you are experiencing right now?
7.20: What was your first thought today?
7.22: What was the last healthy thing you did for yourself?
7.23: What did you have to wait for today?
7.25: Who influenced your day the most?
7.26: What did you learn from today?
7.27: What was the best moment today?
7.28: What did you pay for it?
7.29: What do you want to learn more about?
7.30: What show do you refuse to watch?
7.31: If you could paint a picture of your day, what would it depict?

8.1: What decision would you never want to have to make?
8.3: What is the last thing you learned?
8.4: Where would you like to go?
8.5: The last time you went to the doctor ______________.
8.6: What small act of kindness did you receive or perform today?
8.7: What is the last thing you feel guilty about?
8.8: My life would be easier if ______________.
8.10: When was the last time you intentionally wasted time?
8.12: The device I use most often is ______________.
8.13: How did you spend your free time today?
8.15: What was the last thing you said to someone today?
8.16: Who went wild at the last party you attended?
8.18: How old do you think you are?
8.20: Why did you feel pressured today?
8.21: The last gift I received was ______________.
8.22: If you could change today, would you?
8.24: What did you hope to avoid today?
8.25: Were you in control of the situations today?
8.27: Were you able to listen today?
8.29: Did you break the law? How?

9.1: Chi è l’ultima persona con cui hai passato del tempo piacevolmente?
9.3: Descrivi la tua giornata in una parola.
9.5: Hai parlato o ascoltato di più oggi?
9.7: Qual è l’ultima cosa stupida che hai fatto?
9.8: Qual è il prossimo libro che leggerai?
9.10: Hai avuto un'intuizione o un'idea interessante oggi?
9.12: Se qualcuno dovesse descrivere il tuo comportamento di oggi con una parola, questa sarebbe ______________.
9.13: Hai avuto una conversazione che ti ha fatto riflettere?
9.14: Descrivi l’ultimo oggetto di arredo che hai acquistato.
9.15: A che ora ti sei alzato oggi?
9.16: Descrivi l’ultima volta che hai provato imbarazzo.
9.18: Quanto tempo hai passato fuori casa oggi?
9.19: Il prossimo anno, cosa speri caratterizzi la tua vita?
9.20: Chi nella tua famiglia ha un talento straordinario? Quale?
9.21: Cosa vorresti ci fosse di più nel mondo?
9.23: Quale impatto speri di avere sul mondo?
9.24: Se potessi fare le leggi, quale sarebbe quella di oggi?
9.25: Descrivi l’ultimo episodio che ti ha sconvolto la vita.
9.28: Qual è l’ultimo film che hai visto?
9.31: Qual è il titolo più interessante letto sul giornale di oggi?

10.1: Quale decisione sei soddisfatto di aver preso?
10.3: Da cosa era occupata la tua mente oggi?
10.4: Qual è stata la miglior conversazione oggi?
10.6: Se potessi eliminare una tua abitudine, quale sarebbe?
10.7: Elenca 5 cose che avresti voluto avere con te oggi.
10.8: Quali sono le conquiste personali delle quali sei più orgoglioso?
10.11: Qual è stata l’ultima bugia che hai raccontato?
10.12: Qual è la tua cucina preferita?
10.14: Cosa ti vorresti dire tra un anno?
10.15: Qual è la tua più grande forza?
10.16: A parte i tuoi vestiti, cosa hai avuto con te per la maggior parte del tempo oggi?
10.17: Qual è il tuo peccato più soddisfacente?
10.19: Hai fatto qualcosa di cui vai particolarmente fiero oggi?
10.20: Che impressione hai fatto sugli altri oggi?
10.24: Elenca le ultime 3 cose che hai utilizzato oggi.
10.25: Quale suono o rumore non sopporti?
10.29: Quale oggetto possiedi che ti ricorda un bel momento del passato?

11.1: Chi è il tuo migliore amico?
11.3: C'è stato un momento in cui ti sei sentito particolarmente connesso con qualcuno?
11.4: Quale ricordo vuoi conservare di oggi?
11.5: Se potessi cenare con una persona, viva o morta, chi sceglieresti?
11.13: Quanto sei stato da solo oggi?
11.14: Come stai cercando di ampliare la tua mente?
11.15: Quali parole stai usando spesso ultimamente?
11.16: Come è andata la giornata oggi?
11.17: Qual è stata la prima cosa che hai visto quando ti sei svegliato stamattina?
11.18: Elenca 3 cose che devi fare domani.
11.19: Qual è l’ultimo sito online che hai visitato?
11.21: Oggi avevi pensieri positivi o negativi?
11.22: Chi è la persona più forte che conosci e perché?
11.23: Chi avresti voluto prendesse parte alla tua giornata?
11.24: Qual è una cosa che ti è stata detta oggi e non vuoi dimenticare?
11.25: Qual è stata la tua debolezza oggi?
11.26: Il genere musicale che ascolto più spesso è ______________.
11.28: Per cosa vale la pena combattere?
11.30: Oggi eri più sorridente o corrucciato?
